name: Firebug
description:
Live it up... Burn it down. .. but some objects take longer to burn than others.

Release your inner fire and burn as much as you can before time expires.

::::: Buttescotch ShenaniJam 2018  :::::::

WASD to move, Mouse to look

Shift to run, Space to Jump

Outstanding issue - Terrain Collider, player sometimes falls through the floor...sorry.
